articles.title: Marathi writer, playwright succumbs to Covid-19 - The Indian Express
articles.description: Veteran Marathi writer and playwright Ratnakar Matkari, who was undergoing treatment at Seven Hills hospital in Mumbai, was cremated on Monday at the Bhoiwada crematorium in the presence of family members.
articles.content:
Ratnakar Matkari was awarded the Sangeet Natak Akademi award in 2003 for his contribution to theatre as a playwright.Veteran Marathi writer and playwright Ratnakar Matkari succumbed to Covid-19 on Sunday night. He was 81.
